item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description:
Troubleshooting Steps for Rails

The Rails Framework consists of a complex combination of various tools. There is no compilation step, everything is started from the command line.

As a consequence, things break at runtime, providing you with an informative stack trace and error message that help you find the problem.

You need to learn how to read those stack traces and error messages.

Here are some pointers how to do it:
